#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define mod 1000000007
#define ll long long int
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ll a,b;
        cin>>a>>b;
        ll ans=(a%mod*b%mod-(a%mod+b%mod));
       if(ans<=0)
        cout<<"Infinite Solutions"<<endl;
       else
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
